entities.description: "Covid-19 is an ongoing pandemic event that has caused significant global impact, with new waves and variants affecting public health responses."
"Seattle is a city in the United States where the reality of the Covid wave is evident, with people's behavior reflecting a collective shrug towards the virus."
"New York City is a location where the Covid wave is being met with a collective shrug, indicating a change in public behavior towards the pandemic."
"Chicago is a city where the Covid warning level was raised to 'high', indicating a surge in cases and a significant public health concern."
"Louisiana is a state where a new rise in Covid cases is being compared to a 'downpour within a surge', reflecting the ongoing challenges of the pandemic."
"Julie Bosman is one of the authors of the article discussing the muted warnings and virus surges across the country."
"Thomas Fuller is one of the authors of the article discussing the muted warnings and virus surges across the country."
"Edgar Sandoval is one of the authors of the article discussing the muted warnings and virus surges across the country."
"Americans are referenced in the context of their response to the new Covid wave, with many shunning masks and joining crowds indoors."
"State and local public health officials are responsible for factoring in the reality of the Covid wave and the public's behavior in their response strategies."
"The county’s top doctor in Chicago is responsible for advising residents on how to handle the Covid warning level being raised to 'high'."
"The state health director in Louisiana is responsible for characterizing the rise in Covid cases in the state, likening it to a 'downpour within a surge'."
"Experts are referenced as considering the current variant of Covid-19 to be the most transmissible of the pandemic, influencing the public health response."
"Parkland, Fla., is the location of a high school where a mass shooting occurred in 2018, resulting in 17 deaths."
"Joe Davis is a baseball announcer who took over for Vin Scully and will replace Joe Buck in the Fox booth for the All-Star Game and the World Series."
"Netflix is a streaming service that is hoping 'The Gray Man' will become a blockbuster driver of subscriptions."
"Trump Media is involved in a $300 million deal that is under investigation due to a surge in trading that preceded the announcement."
"New York City epidemiologists are criticizing public health messages for giving misleading and dangerous guidance about the spread of Monkeypox."
"Several venues in New York City offer spaces for enjoying Middle Eastern and North African music, contributing to a thriving Arabic party scene."
"Prime Minister Fumio Kishida of Japan is pursuing Shinzo Abe’s goals, such as a stronger military, while also setting himself apart."
"Shinzo Abe is an influential figure in Japan whose legacy includes goals like a stronger military, which Prime Minister Fumio Kishida is pursuing."
"Chinelo Okparanta is an author of color who uses satire and surrealism to explore racism in her recent books."

entities.description: "Buckingham Palace is a significant location in London, known for the changing of the guard ceremony."
"London is a city in England that experienced record temperatures nearing 100 degrees."
"la Tramontana is an area known for its volatile northerly winds, where a floating wind farm is planned to be constructed."
"Catalonia is a part of Spain that is in need of renewable energy, as it is highly dependent on fossil fuels."

"Kyiv is the capital city of Ukraine, with BUCHA as one of its suburbs."
"Spain is a country where a contentious wind farm project is planned, and where there are efforts to reduce dependence on fossil fuels."
"Dalí was an influential Pop artist who transformed ordinary objects into imposing sculptures."
"The Stanislavchuk family, including Yehor, Natasha, Sasha, Tasya, and Lyudmila, experienced the war in Bucha firsthand."
"European policymakers are working to break free from dependence on Russian oil and gas due to the war in Ukraine."
"The Chicago health department, led by Dr. Allison Arwady, is considering another citywide mask mandate based on hospital strain."
"The BA.5 subvariant has driven a surge in Covid-19 cases since May, causing infections to rise in at least 40 states."

"France is a country where wildfires have been sparked due to the summer heat wave exacerbated by climate change."

entities.description: "The New York Times Company is the publisher of the newspaper mentioned in the text."

"Britain is the geographical area affected by the heatwave described in the text, with various locations and institutions mentioned."
"Europe is mentioned as the region battling fires and experiencing a heatwave that affects Britain."
"Wales holds the record for the hottest temperature ever recorded in the country, mentioned in the context of the heatwave."
"Cambridge is noted for holding the record temperature of 101.7 degrees Fahrenheit in July 2019, referenced in the text."
"London is described as being under a 'red' warning for heat and experiencing temperatures around 100 degrees Fahrenheit."
"Georgia McQuade is a 22-year-old mentioned in the text who is traveling from London to Paris during the heatwave."
"Paris is Georgia McQuade's destination and is expected to have even higher temperatures than London."
"France is mentioned in the context of wildfires and as the origin of a mass of hot air affecting other European countries."
"Najuma Smith-Pollard is a pastor at a Black church in Los Angeles, involved in discussions about abortion rights."

"Roe v. Wade is the Supreme Court decision that was overturned, leading to discussions among faith leaders and politicians."

"Janet L. Yellen is the Treasury Secretary involved in discussions about the global tax agreement and its implications."
"The United States is involved in the global tax agreement and is mentioned in the context of compliance and the pact's aims."
"Joe Manchin III is a Senator who effectively scuttled the Biden administration's tax agenda in Congress."

"Port Lligat is the Mediterranean town where Moises Tibau is a fisherman and where Salvador Dalí composed some of his paintings."
"Salvador Dalí is mentioned as the famous Surrealist painter who composed some of his paintings in Port Lligat."
"The British Museum is noted for closing its galleries because of the extreme heat."

"The London Underground is described as being very hot and not air-conditioned during the heatwave."

"The Supreme Court is mentioned for its role in overturning Roe v. Wade, impacting abortion rights."

"Ireland is involved in the global tax agreement and has a finance minister who met with Janet Yellen."
"The Wind Farm event refers to the government's approval of constructing a huge floating wind farm offshore."
"The Spanish Seascape is the location that inspired Salvador Dalí, where a wind farm may be constructed."
